components.name: FormControlViewerComponent
components.templateData:
Tipo: {{ control.type }}
Valor: {{ control.value | json }}

components.name: HeaderComponent
components.template:
Acme

Welcome, {{ user.name }}!
components.sourceCode:
import { Component, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from './User'; @Component({ selector: 'storybook-header', template: `

Acme

Welcome, {{ user.name }}!
`, styleUrls: ['./header.css'], }) export default class HeaderComponent { @Input() user: User | null = null; @Output() onLogin = new EventEmitter(); @Output() onLogout = new EventEmitter(); @Output() onCreateAccount = new EventEmitter(); }

components.name: PageComponent
components.template:
Pages in Storybook

We recommend building UIs with a component-driven process starting with atomic components and ending with pages.

Render pages with mock data. This makes it easy to build and review page states without needing to navigate to them in your app. Here are some handy patterns for managing page data in Storybook:

  • Use a higher-level connected component. Storybook helps you compose such data from the "args" of child component stories
  • Assemble data in the page component from your services. You can mock these services out using Storybook.

Get a guided tutorial on component-driven development at Storybook tutorials . Read more in the docs .

Tip Adjust the width of the canvas with the Viewports addon in the toolbar
components.sourceCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from './User'; @Component({ selector: 'storybook-page', template: `

Pages in Storybook

We recommend building UIs with a component-driven process starting with atomic components and ending with pages.

Render pages with mock data. This makes it easy to build and review page states without needing to navigate to them in your app. Here are some handy patterns for managing page data in Storybook:

  • Use a higher-level connected component. Storybook helps you compose such data from the "args" of child component stories
  • Assemble data in the page component from your services. You can mock these services out using Storybook.

Get a guided tutorial on component-driven development at Storybook tutorials . Read more in the docs .

Tip Adjust the width of the canvas with the Viewports addon in the toolbar
`, styleUrls: ['./page.css'], }) export default class PageComponent { user: User | null = null; doLogout() { this.user = null; } doLogin() { this.user = { name: 'Jane Doe' }; } doCreateAccount() { this.user = { name: 'Jane Doe' }; } }

components.name: SpecialAutocompleteComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="control && !control.hidden">
  <mat-form-field
    class="w-full"
    [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
  >
    <mat-label
      [ngClass]="{ 'is-link': control.label }"
      class="control-label"
      *ngIf="control.label"
    >
      {{ control.label }}
    </mat-label>
    <input
      type="text"
      autocomplete="off"
      [required]="control.required"
      [readonly]="control.readOnly"
      [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
      matInput
      [formControl]="control"
      [matAutocomplete]="auto"
    />
    <mat-autocomplete
      class="autocomplete-options"
      #auto="matAutocomplete"
      [displayWith]="configValue"
      (optionSelected)="optionSelected($event)"
    >
      <mat-option
        *ngFor="let option of control.settings?.source | async"
        [value]="option"
      >
        {{ option | textByFunction: control.settings.fieldName }}
      </mat-option>
    </mat-autocomplete>
    <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matSuffix>{{ control.icon }}</mat-icon>
    <mat-hint>{{ control.tooltip }}</mat-hint>
    <mat-error>
      {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
    </mat-error>
  </mat-form-field>
</ng-container>

components.name: SpecialDropdownComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">
    {{ control.label }}
  </mat-label>
  <mat-select
    [panelClass]="control.styleClasses"
    [formControl]="control"
    [required]="control.required"
    (selectionChange)="selectItem($event.value)"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
  >
    <mat-option *ngIf="!control.required" [value]="null">
      {{ control.placeholder || control.settings.notSelectedText }}
    </mat-option>
    <mat-option
      *ngFor="let item of control.settings.source | async"
      [value]="item[control.settings.fieldId]"
    >
      {{ item | textByFunction: control.settings.fieldName }}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
  <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matSuffix>{{ control.icon }}</mat-icon>
  <mat-hint *ngIf="control.tooltip">{{ control.tooltip }}</mat-hint>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: SpecialFormsComponent
SpecialInputComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field
  *ngIf="control"
  [id]="control.elementId"
  class="w-full {{ control.styleClasses }}"
  [appearance]="control.label ? 'outline' : 'standard'"
>
  <mat-label *ngIf="control.label">{{ control.label }}</mat-label>
  <input
    matInput
    (blur)="onBlur.emit(control.value)"
    (keydown.enter)="onEnter.emit(control.value)"
    [inputMask]="control.settings?.mask"
    autocomplete="off"
    [type]="control.settings?.type || 'text'"
    [readonly]="control.readOnly"
    [required]="control.required"
    [placeholder]="control.placeholder"
    [formControl]="control"
  />
  <mat-icon *ngIf="control.icon" matPrefix>{{ control.icon }} </mat-icon>
  <mat-hint>
    {{ control.tooltip }}
  </mat-hint>
  <button
    *ngIf="control.settings?.icon"
    mat-icon-button
    matSuffix
    (click)="iconAction.emit()"
  >
    <mat-icon>
      {{ control.settings.icon }}
    </mat-icon>
  </button>
  <mat-error>
    {{ control.errors | errorMessage: control.errorMessages }}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

variables.name: currencyInputMask
variables.defaultValue:
createMask({
  alias: 'numeric',
  groupSeparator: ',',
  autoUnmask: true,
  digits: 2,
  digitsOptional: false,
  prefix: '$ ',
  placeholder: '0',
})

variables.name: EnumToArray
light
variables.defaultValue:
(args: any) => ({
  title: 'Special autocomplete control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    (getData)="getData($event)"
    [autocomplete]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: 0,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue:defaultValue,
      type:'AUTOCOMPLETE',
      settings:{
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        source:source
      },
      errorMessages: errorMessages
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    getData: action('Get data'),
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: SpecialDropdownComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special dropdown control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    [theme]="theme"
    [dropdown]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: length,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue:defaultValue,
      type:'DROPDOWN',
      settings:{
        source:source,
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        notSelectedText:notSelectedText
      },
      errorMessages: errorMessages
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
  },
})

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special input control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [input]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        type:'INPUT',
        settings:{
          icon:icon2,
          mask:mask,
          type:inputType
        },
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.input,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/mask.name: currencyInputMask
projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/mask.defaultValue:
createMask({
  alias: 'numeric',
  groupSeparator: ',',
  autoUnmask: true,
  digits: 2,
  digitsOptional: false,
  prefix: '$ ',
  placeholder: '0',
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.name: Template
projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.defaultValue:
(
  args: SpecialDropdownComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special dropdown control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    [theme]="theme"
    [dropdown]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: length,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue:defaultValue,
      type:'DROPDOWN',
      settings:{
        source:source,
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        notSelectedText:notSelectedText
      },
      errorMessages: errorMessages
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.name: Template
projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.defaultValue:
(
  args: FormControlViewerComponent
) => ({
  title: 'Special input control',
  template: `
    <spf-form-control-viewer
      [theme]="theme"
      [input]="{
        placeholder: placeholder,
        label: label,
        tooltip: tooltip,
        icon: icon,
        elementId: elementId,
        styleClasses: styleClasses,
        length: length,
        defaultValue:defaultValue,
        required: required,
        hidden: false,
        readOnly: readOnly,
        type:'INPUT',
        settings:{
          icon:icon2,
          mask:mask,
          type:inputType
        },
        errorMessages: errorMessages
      }"
      >
    </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    type: EControlTypes.input,
  },
})

projects/special-forms/src/lib/core/util.name: EnumToArray

projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.name: light
projects/special-forms/src/lib/component.defaultValue:
(args: any) => ({
  title: 'Special autocomplete control',
  template: `
  <spf-form-control-viewer
    (getData)="getData($event)"
    [autocomplete]="{
      placeholder: placeholder,
      label: label,
      tooltip: tooltip,
      icon: icon,
      elementId: elementId,
      styleClasses: styleClasses,
      length: 0,
      required: required,
      hidden: false,
      readOnly: readOnly,
      defaultValue:defaultValue,
      type:'AUTOCOMPLETE',
      settings:{
        fieldId: fieldId,
        fieldName:fieldName,
        source:source
      },
      errorMessages: errorMessages
    }"
    >
  </spf-form-control-viewer>`,
  props: {
    ...args,
    getData: action('Get data'),
  },
})
